description: The judicial island of the World Government, also known as the 'Island of Justice.' A massive fortress where criminals are processed before being sent to Impel Down or executed. Enies Lobby is never without daylight.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats' All-Out Assault
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates charge through Enies Lobby's front gate in an all-out battle against Marines and government forces.
keyEvents.significance: The main battlefield where the Straw Hats fight to rescue Robin.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Perfect Clima-Tact Unleashed
keyEvents.description: Nami uses her Perfect Clima-Tact's Thunderbolt Tempo across the battlefield, hitting enemies and allies alike with uncontrolled lightning.
keyEvents.significance: First combat demonstration of the Perfect Clima-Tact's overwhelming power.

keyEvents.title: Watchdog Unit Intercepts Intruders
keyEvents.description: The elite Watchdog Unit of the Law appears to defend Enies Lobby from the Straw Hats' assault.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of Enies Lobby's specialized defense force.

keyEvents.title: Galley-La vs Watchdog Unit
keyEvents.description: The Galley-La foremen engage the Watchdog Unit, allowing the Straw Hats to advance toward the courthouse.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the alliance between Straw Hats and Water 7 forces against the World Government.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Surrounded by Marines
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles thousands of Marines on a cliff within Enies Lobby's fortress.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming military presence defending the judicial island.

keyEvents.title: Franky Family Arrives
keyEvents.description: The Franky Family arrives at Enies Lobby riding the giant King Bulls Sodom and Gomorrah.
keyEvents.significance: Expands the alliance against the World Government at Enies Lobby.

statusHistory.reason: The Straw Hats assault Enies Lobby to rescue Robin

description: The main tower at Enies Lobby where CP9 operates and where criminals are judged. Robin and Franky are held captive here by Spandam.

keyEvents.title: Spandam Reveals Aokiji's Involvement
keyEvents.description: Inside the Tower of Justice, Spandam reveals to Robin and Franky that Aokiji gave him information and the Buster Call authority.
keyEvents.significance: Major revelation about the conspiracy behind Robin's capture.

keyEvents.title: Spandam Explains Deal Loophole
keyEvents.description: In the Tower of Justice, Spandam reveals how he manipulated the terms of his deal with Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Spandam's cruel manipulation and undermines Robin's sacrifice.

statusHistory.reason: CP9's base of operations at Enies Lobby
